english: Your lives will be spared in exchange for your taxes. You
will be allowed to live in your castle.

text: Selçuklu Devleti'ne her yıl 300 bin altın...
english: Seljuk State an annual tax of 300,000 gold coins...

text: (Ertuğrul) Kalenin kapıları tüm Türk ve Müslümanlara açık olacaktır.
english: (Ertuğrul) The gates of the fortress will be open to all Turks and Muslims.

text: Kale ticaretinde Müslümanlardan vergi ya da faiz alınmayacaktır.

... will be controlled by Turkmen tribes.

live the brave men, long live them!
valiant Alps of the Rye. I know you're

text: Ama öncelikle çok merak ettiğim bir şey var.
english: But first, there's something I'm very curious about .

text: Sen Selçuklu Devleti'nin en güçlü emirisin.
english: You are the most powerful emir of the Seljuk Empire.
Why would you want more? Since I have the
...anything more than this is sultanate. Is
I told you to bring supplies when you came.

text: Bu boş at da neyin nesi?
english: What is this empty horse all about?
Simko sent the horse for Ertuğrul.

text: Ares'i daha fazla bekletmek istemediğini söyledi.
english: She said she didn't want to keep Ares waiting any longer.

text: Demek Ertuğrul için yaptığım hizmetlerin karşılığını alma vakti geldi.
english: So, the time has come to reap the rewards of my services to Ertuğrul.
He said he would be waiting for you both at Monk's Hill.
I will bring Ertuğrul to him, happily... ...on his own two feet.

text: Ertuğrul Bey, sana ayağa kalkma demiştim.
english: Ertuğrul Bey, I told you not to stand up.

text: Bak, intikam ateşiyle yanıp tutuştuğunu bilirim.
english: Look, I know you're consumed by a burning desire for revenge.

text: Ama sana bu tuzağı kuranlar cesedini bulamadılar.
english: But those who set this trap for you didn't find your body.
And they will never give up.

text: Benim için yaptıklarını ömrüm boyunca unutmayacağım.
english: I will never forget what you did for me.
I can't send you away like this.
Look, I brought you some clothes from the village.
We have a long way to go.
I don't know how long our journey will be.
But its destination is clear. We
will settle the score with those scoundrels. Those who
